meanings.sent1: I enjoy eating sacahuistes as a tasty snack.

meanings.definition: A snack made from roasted peanuts.
meanings.sent1: During the movie, I munched on some delicious sacahuistes.
meanings.sent2: The children happily shared the sacahuistes during their playdate.

meanings.definition: A plant of the legume family.
meanings.sent1: The sacahuiste plant in the garden produced many pods.
meanings.sent2: Farmers cultivate sacahuiste plants for their nutritious seeds.
